Name: Animalia - The Quiz Game
About the game: Animalia - The Quiz Game is mostly ahm.. a quiz game! We'll show you a photo of an animal and you need to get the name right. By doing so, bing!, you'll go into the next level and repeat the process until you beat the game! You'll know more animals than before, guaranteed! Main Features 151 Animals to Guess Relaxing and Cheerful Music Earn Gold Solving Words! Spend gold on letters or full words to solve more puzzles! Multiple Languages (English, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese and German so far)
